caption:
Happy Birthday to a Media & Business Trailblazer! 🎉⁠
⁠
Today we celebrate Robert L. Johnson, the visionary founder of BET and the first African American billionaire. Through his work, he's built platforms that empowered Black creatives to shine and helped countless others build wealth and legacy. 💼✨⁠
⁠
From entertainment to enterprise, here’s to honoring his impact and the doors he’s opened for generations to come. 🙌🏾⁠
⁠
Follow @officialblackwallstreet for more Black excellence and Black-owned businesses. #BlackExcellence
